channel.title: Lol
channel.description:
So check this out... Some kid goes around reviewing RSPS and reviews Keith's server...
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_1F8vgsSuco
Watch the first minute or so, and then fast forward to 6:45 and watch from there, random players jump on him and flame the shit out of the server on video, yet he includes it and uploads it... I genuinely laughed out loud watching it, seriously amused me!
(6:12:00 AM) Zorian: i m (6:12:04 AM) Kryp: LOL!!!!!! (6:12:23 AM) Kryp: hes trying to review it and people r flaming the shit out of the server and him (6:12:44 AM) Zorian: wow he;s on windows XP (6:12:52 AM) Zorian: but using a windows 7 theme (6:12:58 AM) Zorian: rofl here come the flamers (6:13:02 AM) Zorian: lmao! (6:13:03 AM) Zorian: "Stfu" (6:13:12 AM) Kryp: lol (6:13:14 AM) Zorian: lmao (6:13:17 AM) Zorian: i fucking h8 this server (6:13:24 AM) Kryp: ive watched it like 5 times and im laughing so hard still (6:13:28 AM) Zorian: y wud he include this in the video (6:13:29 AM) Zorian: rofl (6:13:35 AM) Kryp: rofl (6:13:47 AM) Zorian: it would have been so easy for him to cut that out (6:14:02 AM) Zorian: why would he give the community a 7 (6:14:06 AM) Zorian: if he just logged on (6:14:11 AM) Zorian: and the ppl there r telling him to stfu (6:14:55 AM) Kryp: rofl (6:16:05 AM) Kryp: its funny how 2 people appear out of no where (6:16:08 AM) Kryp: telling him to stfu (6:16:11 AM) Kryp: omg (6:16:24 AM) Kryp: he is the shittest reviewer ever (6:16:26 AM) Kryp: reviews fluxbb (6:16:27 AM) Zorian: ikr (6:16:29 AM) Kryp: 'pretty basic, but good' (6:16:30 AM) Zorian: rofl (6:16:33 AM) Zorian: yeah (6:17:06 AM) Kryp: lol im laughing at roid so much (6:17:32 AM) Kryp: 'i fucking h8 this server', hes typing as if he hates a guy that fucked his gf or something (6:17:34 AM) Kryp: so much anger (6:17:42 AM) Zorian: lmao ik (6:17:50 AM) Kryp: like (6:17:54 AM) Kryp: hes being flamed by everyone (6:18:00 AM) Kryp: and then casually types 7 for community (6:18:02 AM) Kryp: im fucking dying

item.title: Lol
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

I like how Roid Rage is walking away to train then the recorder says “Time to give the scores” and he does a u-turn and waddles back to flame the shit out of him.

I couldn’t give a fuck what server it is, it’s just amusing how shit the review is and him being flamed! He gives PvP 6 and skilling 8 on a PK server… and the community a 7 when he’s being flamed by everyone LOL!
